chapter.text: Nanigoto ni tsuite, kare-ra wa tazune au no ka
Idaina shosoku ni tsui te
Sore ni tsuite, kare-ra wa iken ga kotonaru
Iya, kare-ra wa yagate shirou
Iya, iya, kare-ra wa yagate shirudearou
Ware wa daichi o, hirobiro to shinakatta ka
Mata yamayama o, kui to shitate wanai ka
Ware wa anata gata o ryosei ni tsukuri
mata kyusoku no tame, anata gata no suimin o sadame
yoru o oi to shi
hiru o seikei no shudan to shite sadameta
Mata ware wa, anata gata no ue ni kengo ni 7-so (no ten) o uchi-date
teru ya kashi tomoshi hi o (sono naka ni) oki
ware wa kumo kara yutaka ni ame o furase
sore ni yotte, kara-mono ya yasai o moe dasa se
samazamana en o shigera seru
Hontoni sabaki no hi wa sadame rarete ite
sonohi, rappa ga fuka reruto anata gata wa gun o nashite detekuru
Ten wa aka rete kazukazu no mon to nari
yamayama wa utsusa rete shinkiro no yo ni naru
Hontoni jigoku wa, machibuse no badeari
haishin-sha no ochitsuku tokoro
kare-ra wa itsumademo sono naka ni sumudearou
Sokode suzushi-sa mo ajiwaezu,(don'na) nomimono mo nai
nietagiru yu to no no soto ni wa
(Kare-ra no tame) fusawashi hoshodearu
Hontoni kare-ra wa,(sono okonai ni taisuru) seisan o kibo shinaide ita
Mata kare-ra wa waga shirushi o usodearu to itte, tsuyoku kyohi shita
Ware wa issai no koto o, ten no sho ni tomete iru
Dakara anata gata wa (jibun no okonai no kekka o) ajiwae. Ware wa chobatsu o zoka suru bakaridearu
Hontoni omo o osoreru mono ni wa, anzen'na basho (rakuen) ga aru
Midori no en ya, budo-en
mune no fukureta onaji toshigoro no otome-tachi
mata naminamito afureru hai
Sokode wa tsumaranu hanashi ya itsuwarigoto o kikanai
Korera wa anata no nushi kara no hosho, tamamono no kessandearu
Ten to ji, soshite sonoaida no subete no mono no shu, jihibukaki okata (kara no tamamonodeari), dare mo kare ni katarikakeru koto wa dekinai
Seirei to tenshi-tachi ga, seiretsu shite tatsu hi, jihibukaki okata kara o yurushi o ete tadashi koto o iu mono igai ni wa, dare mo kuchi o kiku koto ga dekinai
Sore wa shinjitsu no hidearu. Dakara dare demo nozomu mono wa,-nushi no omoto ni modoruga i

Hontoni ware wa, chobatsu ga chikai to, anata gata ni keikoku shita. Sonohi, hito wa, jibun no ryoho no te ga maemotte itta mono (shogyo) o mirudearou. Fushin-sha wa,`a , nasakenai, watashi ga chirideattanaraba.' To iudearou
